channel.title: Llm on Joost Plattel
channel.description: Recent content in Llm on Joost Plattel

item.title: Manava
item.description:
Together with Arjan and Oskar from Manava I advise and help organisation with technology. Arjan best describes my activities as following:

Joost builds systems that think and do.

A pretty rad (and short!) description of the things I do, from hardware to sofware! If you need a bigger team to tackle things, working with Manava is recommended!

item.title: Huub
item.description: Working with the team from Huub I’ve setup the authentication & authorization stack with Auth0. I’ve also worked on improving endpoints and websocket handling. As well es setting up architecture for multi-tenancy within Auth0 and the FastAPI stack.

item.title: Tellart
item.description:
I’ve worked with Tellart on the Dinner in 2050 installation for the UAE Pavilion. For COP28 the goal of this installation is to make people think about climate change in a very personal way.

Visitors would be asked to tell about their favorite dish which would then be transformed into a dish in 2050 with an ingredient swapped out that would have the most impact on climate change. Over 18.000 meals were generated by the visitors.
